summary:
**CEO & Board Transition Announcement:**  
嫖- **CEO Retirement:** Rhys Jones (CEO) retiring after 19 years, effective 1 Jan 2026.  
嫖- **New CEO Appointment:** Gavin Street (current Chief Commercial Officer) to become MD/CEO from 1 Jan 2026.  
嫖- **Chair Transition:** Rhys Jones proposed as new non-executive Chair (subject to election at Oct 2025 AGM); Russell Chenu to remain as lead independent director.  
嫖- **Operational Continuity:** Adrian Casey (COO) to remain in executive role; no immediate operational disruptions expected.  
嫖- **Governance:** Board majority (4/7 directors) remains independent post-transition.  

No material financial or trading impact identified.
